title: Batmantis
guest_stars: Adam West, Lee Meriwether, Eartha Kitt
synopsis: A mysterious villain kidnaps Moltar and Space Ghost must solicit the help of Adam West, Lee Meriweather and Eartha Kitt, all from the "Batman" television series, in an effort to save him. And...holy exoskeleton, Space Ghost, it's Zorak as Batmantis!

transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Funny, Adam, what other funny stories can you tell me before we go on the air?

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Uh, oh yes, I remember one time with the late Vincent Price, who played Egghead...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: We were in the cliff-hanger on the show, and, uh, we were supposed to be in an egg fight, Robin and I, with Egghead. Well, the prop guys had brought probably eight-- (Space Ghost dozes off, monitor goes blank)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (wakes up) Ehhh... Well? Okay! We're back with Bobcat Goldthwait. What? Where am I? Moltar, what happened to the feed? Did I fall asleep, Zorak?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, get the feed back! Sorry. Was I snoring or anything?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You were drooling.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oooow... Moltar, what are you doing? Moltar! Now I'm punchy. (Invisos to the control room; Moltar isn't there. He reads a note on Moltar's screen) "If you ever want to see Moltar again, surrender your power bands and give me control of the universe. If you don't comply, Moltar will be resickled, recycled. Signed, Your Mother." Hmmm...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Holy stolen lava, Space Ghost, Moltar's been kidnapped!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Right you are, my little green friend. An evil ploy by Your Mother. (flies back to desk)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Your mother.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, not my mom, somebody else's mom. Someone's sick and deranged mom.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, we'll need help. I'll scan the Space Frequency Demodulator with my Remote Control Ray to find Batman. Restricted.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You do that... (echo effect) I am becoming...

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Meanwhile, at the bandstand, a hideous mutation rears its ugly head. So hideous, that it must be censored. (explosion)

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: I shiver with power. I ache with disease. I am Batmantis! ("Batman" music & sound effects begin in background)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aaaa! (starts to fire at Batmantis)

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: Wait! (balloon with "Blap!")

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, it's you! Good costume. Look! Shoot a ray, and you get a word. (shoots ray, gets balloon with "Obvious Parody!")

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: Shoot an adjective.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (shoots ray, gets "Insipid!")

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: Shoot a proper noun!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (shoots ray, gets "Kenny Rogers!")

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: Shoot the theory of evolution!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (shoots ray, gets three paragraphs of unreadable text) Look into the eyes of justice, Your Mother. You'll never get my power bands, savvy? Batmantis and I will fight you to the end.

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: I must go to the control room.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: To get butter and cheese?

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: No, to find Moltar.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, oh, yeah, yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Lee Meriwether! (sting music)

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You were Catwoman, weren't you?

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: Yes, a long, long time ago. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm looking for Batman, but maybe you can help me too.

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: I beg your pardon?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar's been kidnapped, and I must save him.

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: Oh, dear, the pity.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Will you work with me, Lee?

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: It would be thrilling, I, I, I'll take on, I'll take on the job if you really think I could.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I do. I'll send you up to Batmantis.

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: Okay. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Have you ever met Batmantis?

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: I haven't, but I can hardly wait!

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: (In the control room) Lee Meriwether!

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: Oh, is that it?

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: Afraid?

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: Moltar's been stolen!

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: Well, I don't think you have to worry or fear, because, um, uh, we have two great caped crusaders, Batman and...

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: I am Batmantis! Say it with me, Bat-Mantis!

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: Oh dear!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (back in the studio) Moltar, can you hear me? Are you there, son?

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Yes, hello, hello.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Great, you're back, Adam!

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: You're talking to me?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ahem! I mean, Bruce Wayne. (in low voice) I know you're really Batman, (in normal voice again) but can I call you Adam, Adam?

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Sure, if you want to blow my cover, Tad.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look, Your Mother's taken Moltar. Become Batman and help me.

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Come on, I need your super-powers.

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Uh, I have none.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What!

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: I'm just a little crazy, obsessed with fighting crime, but I have no super-powers.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, your whole life is a lie.

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Wherever I find it, I fight crime, and there is a crime here today, I see.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No kidding.

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: (they stare at each other for a while, then Adam holds up book he wants to plug) Look, look!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's nice. Listen, if I use my mask in combination with my

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Yes, all the answers, all the answers are here in my new book.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: All the answers?

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Yes, all the answers. (laughing)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Will you beam me a copy right now?

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Yes, if you'll take me to lunch somewhere in the universe.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No time for lunch, Adam. Gimme the book.

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Gimme the book!

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pause) You wimp. Well, I won't have to fight Your Mother alone. I have a Batmantis.

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: I have a Robin.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I have a Batmantis.

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: I have a Robin, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You, sir, have nothing. You've been cancelled.

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Shut up, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm still on the air. I'll fight without you.

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Good. I'll be here when you get back.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pause) Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Am I a difficult guest?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, you're a prince! (telephone starts ringing)

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Are you disappointed?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: A call on the space feed! I have to go, Adam, er, Batman, I mean, Bruce. Whatever!

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Is this-- (zaps off screen, replaced by Your Mother)

transcript.speaker: Your Mother
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Who are you?

transcript.speaker: Your Mother
transcript.dialogue: I am Your Mother! (sting music)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You are not!

transcript.speaker: Your Mother
transcript.dialogue: Heed my will, surrender your power bands to me at once!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're not my mom!

transcript.speaker: Your Mother
transcript.dialogue: Yes I am!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Are not!

transcript.speaker: Your Mother
transcript.dialogue: Yes I am!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What have you done with Moltar, you harlot?

transcript.speaker: Your Mother
transcript.dialogue: He's locked in a sub-zero vaporizing cabinet, where he'll catch his death. (sting music)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My God, woman, that'll kill him!

transcript.speaker: Your Mother
transcript.dialogue: Eat your peas.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No! (sting music)

transcript.speaker: Your Mother
transcript.dialogue: Clean your room!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh uh! (sting music) [Hey, this thing in the monitor is not my mother] (more sting music) [My room was always clean. Must think of a plan...]

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: (back in control room) You are not Catwoman, Julie Newmar is Catwoman.

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: Julie was our first Catwoman. And then I came in and did the movie...

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: Julie's better.

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: Well, Eartha, for my money, was the best Catwoman.

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: Gimme your money! (sting music)

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: I beg your pardon?

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: Gimme your money! (sting music)

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I see. (laughs) Actually, that, that was very good.

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: You mock me? (sting music) Purr like a cat!

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: Oh, please, the children! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (back in the studio) Listen up, you parasite, I've joined forces with Batmantis and we'll bring you down!

transcript.speaker: Your Mother
transcript.dialogue: Batmantis is no match for me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No one's a match for you, you harlot! Tell me where Moltar is!

transcript.speaker: Your Mother
transcript.dialogue: Repent, Space Ghost. Mourn for the frozen, in five minutes I'll pull the freeze lever, and Moltar becomes glacierized. Or, you surrender your power bands. I await your decision. Don't be late now! (hangs up)

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Will Space Ghost surrender his power bands and save Moltar from Your Mother? Will Adam West come to his aid or will he wimp out? Will every word Batmantis says be followed by that suspenseful sting music? What will happen next? Why is the sky blue? What is the mystery of the Yeti? (says "Hi") Do you know the Muffin Man? Stay tuned to find out!
INTERRUPT FEED

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: When we last left him, Batmantis was having a heart-to-heart with Lee Meriwether, and Space Ghost was being bullied by Your Mother.

transcript.speaker: Your Mother
transcript.dialogue: Surrender your power bands, Space Ghost. I await your decision. (hangs up)

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Do you have any other questions? (sting music)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Adam, go peddle your book somewhere else!

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: All right, let me open the book, and read. "Dark ominous clouds hung over the..."

transcript.speaker: Adam West
transcript.dialogue: Adam, see you at the auto show. (zaps him off screen)

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: R-r-r-r-aow!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Meow!

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: You mean "r-r-r-r-aow!"

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Meow meow, meow meow meow meow meow meow! (subtitles, with bouncing dot: "Eartha Kitt, join my forces to save Moltar.")

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: What planet are you on?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ghost Planet.

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: Well, how does it feel to be on a ghost planet?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It feels like Wednesday every day!

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: That's interesting.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Adam West refuses to become Batman and help me.

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) But I think that's why he was chosen to be Batman, because it's a sort of non-nothing character.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And he's shallow. Zorak, however, has become Batmantis, and he's more apt to help me.

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: Oh, once a bug, always a bug.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Shhhh, he's right upstairs.

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I see, okay.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Let me fill you in...

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: (back in the control room) Look into my eyes.

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: Look into my eyes!

transcript.speaker: Lee Meriwether
transcript.dialogue: You need a, a lobotomy.

transcript.speaker: Batmantis
transcript.dialogue: (looks shocked)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (back in the studio) And since Adam bailed out, we could use some help.

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I, well, I don't even think I'll be that interested in any form or fashion.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Is Catwoman a fraidy-cat?

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: Oh, well, I don't know about that.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: How about I call you Chicken Woman?

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: Well, I'm not very fond of the title...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're all alike, you Catwomen. Tease tease tease.

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I feel very feline all the time.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Quit workin' it.

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: So I feel as though I'm slithering...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Cut the act, sister!

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: Particularly when I see a man, you know, I want to sort of slither into his arms.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I -- Really?

transcript.speaker: Eartha Kitt
transcript.dialogue: (image zaps off, and is replaced by Your Mother)

transcript.speaker: Your Mother
transcript.dialogue: Time's up, Space Ghost. Your lolly-gagging kills your friend. Watch as I pull the freeze lever.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Noooooo!!! Moltaaaaar!!!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: ... Moltar... huh?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Hey, Space Ghost, I'm trying to work here.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, is that really you?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: In the flesh, if I had flesh.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aww, Moltar! And Zorak!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: And what?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I had the most awful dream! Let's have a bake sale.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What are these?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Butterscotch haystacks.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Gross!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What's in these ladyfingers, Moltar?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Lady fingers.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Are you gonna look, or are you gonna buy?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I don't like oatmeal cookies, they make me go.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: These look like fig newt-- hey, you didn't bake these!
